snippet.title: Winter Fox gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Winter Fox is a classic platformer.

To save your abducted brother you must brave many challenges that test your reflexes. Squash monsters, collect coins and power-ups, and avoid nefarious traps!

All assets are hand drawn by my son. This is our first game, made from scratch to learn Unity.

Trailer music by Patrick de Arteaga (CC)

Play it online: https://witching.itch.io/winterfox
